short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Extension helps you to autofill the date in your Notion database.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Notion Date Auto Filler

Enhance your productivity with Notion Date Auto Filler, a lightweight extension designed to simplify your workflow in Notion.

✨ Key Features:
✔️ Customize starting and ending dates effortlessly within your date tables.
✔️ Easily copy and paste dates directly into your Notion database tables.
✔️ Exclude specific days with ease for better scheduling and planning.

Make Notion more productive and distraction-free with this powerful tool.

Available for: Chrome, Firefox, Brave, and Edge.

If you love this extension, please consider supporting it with a ★★★★★ rating!

Tag, Share, and Comment to spread the word about Notion Date Auto Filler.
